00020 #ifndef CO_COMMANDFUNC_H
00021 #define CO_COMMANDFUNC_H
00022 
00023 #include <co/types.h>
00024 #include <lunchbox/debug.h>
00025 
00026 // If you get a warning in your code, add this before in including this file:
00027 //  #pragma warning( disable: 4407 )
00028 // This warning is 'fixed' by https://github.com/Eyescale/Equalizer/issues/100
00029 
00030 namespace co
00031 {
00038     template< typename T > class CommandFunc
00039     {
00040     public:
00045         CommandFunc( T* object, bool (T::*func)( ICommand& ))
00046             : _object( object ), _func( func ) {}
00047 
00052         template< typename O > CommandFunc( const CommandFunc< O >& from )
00053                 : _object( _convertThis< O >( from._object )),
00054                   _func( static_cast<bool (T::*)( ICommand& )>(from._func))
00055             {}
00056 
00058         bool operator()( ICommand& command )
00059         {
00060             LBASSERT( _object );
00061             LBASSERT( _func );
00062             return (_object->*_func)( command );
00063         }
00064 
00068         void clear() { _object = 0; _func = 0; }
00070         bool isValid() const { return _object && _func; }
00071 
00072         // Can't make private because copy constructor needs access. Can't
00073         // declare friend because C++ does not allow generic template friends in
00074         // template classes.
00075         //private:
00076         T* _object; 
00077         bool (T::*_func)( ICommand& ); 
00078 
00079 
00080     private:
00081         template< class F > T* _convertThis( F* ptr )
00082         {
00083 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00084             // https://github.com/Eyescale/Equalizer/issues/100
00085             return reinterpret_cast< T* >( ptr );
00086 #else
00087             return ptr;
00088 #endif
00089         }
00090     };
00091 
00093     template< typename T >
00094     inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os,
00095                                        const CommandFunc<T>& func )
00096     {
00097         if( func.isValid( ))
00098             os << "CommandFunc of " << lunchbox::className( func._object );
00099         else
00100             os << "NULL CommandFunc";
00101         return os;
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00105 #endif //CO_COMMANDFUNC_H
